about_the_game:
"Still Water" is an adult BL visual novel with interactive mini-games.

Dive into the story of two men from vastly different worlds as they cross paths, and explore the intense passion that binds them together ❤

✦ No love, only lust... Can it work?

In a world shaped by one's dominant or submissive inclinations, Skoll, a man with a secondary gender, visits an exclusive stress-relief club for the upper class to satisfy his physical needs.

As a Switch, he harbors desires for both domination and submission.

There, he meets Mellon, a Dom. What begins as a purely physical and professional relationship within the club gradually grows far more complicated.

A British executive assistant working in biotech.
A refined and well-mannered gentleman, Skoll exudes an air of elegance and calm, with a distant coolness beneath his friendly demeanor.
Devoted to his career, he considers his work the entirety of his life, showing little interest in other aspects. Skoll regards himself as a boring person but sees no reason to change.


A mischievous and devilish young man.
Half-English, half-Japanese, Mellon works at the club, entertaining patrons with indulgences of the flesh.
Though he appears calm and obedient at first glance, his playful nature soon emerges. With a strong passion for sex and an alluring, enigmatic charm, he is impossible to resist.

✦ A visual novel as the main narrative, enhanced with interactive mini-games

✦ Over 100,000 words of text

✦ Two main male characters and one supporting male character

✦ Key scenes voiced in Japanese

✦ Explicit, animated H-scenes, with no fewer than 9 intimate sequences

✦ A single linear storyline with minimal decision-making stress (note: multiple endings included)

✦ BDSM dynamics—whether you want to be pampered or punished, it is your choice ❤

✦ Over 20 CG illustrations (excluding variations, including HCGs)

✦ Safe Mode to skip specific H-scenes if desired

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit adult content. All featured characters are of legal age.

The story includes mild themes of BDSM, graphic sexual scenes between men, depictions of Casual Sex Enthusiast, occasional violence, and explicit language.

Note: The game features a ""switch dynamic"" between characters, allowing players to explore versatile interactions. A Safe Mode is available for skipping specific pairings or scenes.

name: Still Water

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 +
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is a BL adult game.In a Dom/Sub modern society, Skoll, a Switch, visits an exclusive club to ease his physical needs. There, he meets Mellon, a Dom. What begins as a purely physical connection within the club soon becomes far more complicated.
supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
